title: when was i banned and will i get rewards?
body:
i gave my friend to play this acc and when i got it he was like he dont need it anymore and unfortunately i saw it was 0 honor lvl but idk when it was banned
so how do i know ign:NYKboss

replies.body:
Have to file a ticket with Riot Support. They are nice and will tell you everything you want to know about your personal account.

In the future, I recommend never sharing your account, ever, even with friends.

Looks like that suspension started on 8/31 which means it'll be disqualified from ranked rewards. Also, keep in mind [**account sharing**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204214670) is strictly again the ToU
